item.title: Implementing a Schedule
item.dc:creator: Karl
item.description: One week ago the work that had been done by Stephanie Douglas and Erik Tollerud was merged into astroplan. I made a straw-man API for scheduling in astroplan, partially based off their work, and submitted it as a proposal PRto get feedback on what makes sense and what should be added/changed to the ...READ MORE...

item.description: And Then There Were Plots!These plots are reproduced fromBoerner et al. (2012), which utilized initial calibrations of AIA.
